articles.author: Rajesh Roy, Kelvin Chan
articles.title: India hosts a high-stakes AI summit, drawing 20 leaders and top tech CEOs - AP News
articles.description: India is hosting a major AI summit in New Delhi this week, as it pushes to shape global rules and show its own AI ambitions. The five-day meeting begins Monday and brings leaders and tech chiefs together in what organizers call the first big AI summit in the …
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) India is hosting an artificial intelligence summit this week, bringing together heads of state, senior officials and tech executives to New Delhi for a five-day gathering highlighting … [+5129 chars]
